classScheduleInformation: Students must register for one lecture-discussion and one quiz section.
courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: CHEM 104 or CHEM 204; credit or concurrent registration in CS 101.
description: Lectures and problems on material and energy balances.  Prerequisite: CHEM 104 or CHEM 204; credit or concurrent registration in CS 101.
label: Principles of CHE
